mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS userId, u.nickname, u.avatar, u.description, CASE WHEN f2.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS relation FROM follows AS f JOIN user AS u ON f.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN follows AS f2 ON f2.target_user_id = f.user_id AND f2.user_id = #{visitorUserId} WHERE f.target_user_id = #{userId}
